string_attributes.value: Defines the frame recording method of media stored.

string_attributes.value: Defines the format applied when 1080p media is played back from storage.

string_attributes.value: Defines the format applied when 4K or QHD media is played back from storage.

string_attributes.value: Defined the type of conversion, if any, applied to the selected input when it is 4K.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defined the type of conversion, if any, applied to the output when playing media from storage or while recording.

string_attributes.value: Define the SDI output format RAW.

string_attributes.value: Define the SDI output format RAW.

string_attributes.value: Define the SDI output format RAW.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines whether or not the scaled video output to the monitor is additionally cropped to 1080.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines whether SDI output is Level B or Level A

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines whether SDI outpt is Auto, Square or 2SI

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines whether or not HDMI Output is scaled

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines override value for HDMI/EDID - 10-bit YCbCr, 8-bit RGB, or 4K 420

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Enables the On-Screen Display of the timecode and transport state

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines the LCD overlay's alpha percent

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Selects a video input source from the video input connections available.  This is the video that will be recorded and/or passed through.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Selects an audio input source, including SDI, Analog, AES, and HDMI.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Selects the number of audio channels to record.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Selects the audio channels output to the headphones and shown in the VU Meters.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Allows the user to select the input channel mapping for 8 channel Audio destinations (HDMI, AES, and Analog Audio).

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines whether SDI input is Auto, Square or 2SI

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value:
Deternimes analog audio input signal levels
+24dBu - Pro-level USA signal level of +24dBu.
+18dBu - Pro-level Europe signal level of +18dBu.
+15dBu - Pro-level German signal level of +15dBu.
+12dBu - Consumer signal level of +12dBu.
Note: Professional audio equipment has much higher levels than consumer equipment: a 0 VU reading corresponds to +4 dBu. Connecting a consumer device to a professional audio input typically does not have sufficient power to drive the input.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Selects source of reference video used to genlock to during playback.  The system always genlocks to the selected input during capture.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Selects the source of timecode from those available when in RS422 Local.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Selects the source of timecode from those available when in RS422 Remote.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Selects the source of timecode from those available when in RS422 Local.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Selects the source of timecode from those available when in FW400 Remote.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Selects an hour for timecode to start.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Selects drop frame or non-drop frame timecode.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Enable or disable Interval (time lapse) recording.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: How many frames to capture each interval.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Define whether the Ki Pro device is in normal Record-Play or Data Transfer mode.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Debounced (readable) param to tell if the Ki Pro device is in normal Record-Play or Data Transfer mode.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Should records attempt to rollover to the next available media?

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Sets the maximum length (in minutes) of a recording.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines the video data encoding method for low frame rates.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines the video data encoding method for high frame rates.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines the video data encoding method for low frame rates.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines the video data encoding method for high frame rates and slow SSDs.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines what file format will be used when recording new clips.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Turns looped playback on and off.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Continue or alarm and stop on dropped frames during playback.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines what file system format will be used when formatting media via 6.2 Format Media.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Format the currently selected storage device.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Delete clips on the selected media.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Delete selected clip on the selected media.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines the reel name associated with all clips generated while using this setting.  Also the name of the media as it will appear when the storage device is mounted on a Mac OSX desktop (and media was formatted by Ki Pro).

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: The assigned name of the unit

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines the clip name associated with all clips generated while using this setting. The clip name is either ''Clip'' or ''SC''.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines the clip number, from 1 to 999, that follows the CLIP NAME, and is associated with all clips generated while using this setting.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Used with parameter 17.5 ALPHA APPEND to append a text value after the CLIP NUMBER or have no text appended.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Used with parameter 17.4 CLIP APPEND to append a text value after the CLIP NUMBER.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines the TAKE number, from 1 to 999, that follows the CLIP NAME and CLIP NUMBER, followed by any ALPHA APPEND (if selected), generated for all clips while using this setting.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Adds the Unit Designation and Preset Reel Name as a prefix to each Clip Name and Number.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines whether to generate a default clipname or to use a custom clipname provided by the user.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: A custom clip name used to generated recorded clipnames if set up to do so with parameter 16.4.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines the TAKE number, from 1 to 999, that follows the Custom Name. This is only used when Use Custom Clipname is YES.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines whether to use the gang master's clip name or the name on the slave.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines whether or not to create a captions track. If enabled, any captions found in ANC data will be recorded. It is possible for a track to be created for which no frames included ANC captions data.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Stop or continue recording on loss of video input.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines whether or not an editing master may control the system over the RS422 port.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines whether or not the system participates in group recordings with other Ki Pros on the local network.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines whether or not this system controls others for group recording.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines the video format output from the system’s internal test signal generator.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines the video signal output from the system’s internal test signal generator.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines the audio signal output from the system’s internal test signal generator.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines the type of TCP/IP network configuration used by the system.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: A fixed private address used when the default IP address is selected.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: The IP address assigned by a DHCP server if DHCP networking is selected.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: A fixed subnet mask used when default addressing is selected.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: The subnet mask assigned by a DHCP server if DHCP networking is selected.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines the IP address of the gateway used for TCP/IP networking if static addressing is selected.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: A fixed gateway used when the default IP address is selected.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: The gateway assigned by a DHCP server if DHCP networking is selected.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines the IP address of the gateway used for TCP/IP networking if static addressing is selected.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Defines a name for the system and gives it a unique identifier. This same name is used both when displaying systems via the web interface and for display on the screen saver (if System name is chosen in Parameter 70.1 Screen Saver).

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: The MAC address of the wired ethernet adapter.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Manually sets the calendar date and time of the internal realtime clock. The value is defined as DD/MM/YYYY (day/month/year).

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Determines the brightness of the alphanumeric VFD display and front panel backlit buttons.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Sets the length of time that the UI must be inactive before the screensaver starts

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: The formatted string version of the serial number.

string_attributes.value: Path to location on filesystem to record or play clips.

string_attributes.value: Internal parameter for controlling use of media.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Command and result to change storage media.  To change, set param to "Next".  Result will be "NotChange/Success" on success, otherwise one of the other result/error codes.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Which media slot is currently selected.

string_attributes.value: Go to a clip - like NextClip, PrevClip

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Current system shutdown message. OBSOLETE, Use eParamID_ShutdownMessageII

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Comma separated list IP addresses of systems contained within gang/record group.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: This is an internal parameter used by Gang Record. Do not use. See eParamID_CustomClipName instead.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: An internal storage place for camera metadata. Do not use. See eParamID_CurrentClip instead.

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: Indication that files may have been deleted or added to the selected media and an updated All Clips and/or playlist should be requested.

string_attributes.name: description

string_attributes.name: description
string_attributes.value: The value is a JSON array of Network Services discovered by the unit

string_attributes.name: description

string_attributes.value: Human-readable result of a preset export operation.

string_attributes.name: description
